Class Poised

java.lang.Object
Poised
public class Poised extends Object
Creates objects under different classes to generate a database to access data from and modify the data.

Create objects under 'Contacts' for customer, contractor and architect by sending their respective file name.
These object's lists are then sent to the 'ProjectDetails' class to crate an object under it. This essentially our database to work with.

We generate a menu that lets the user choose from:
Add a new project.
Update a chosen project.
View all uncompleted projects.
View all overdue projects.
Search for a project using its name or number.
Quit/terminate the program.

Version:
3.0, 30/08/2022
Author:
Ifekharul Islam

    • search

      public static void search(ProjectDetails readProj, Scanner user)
      Lets the user search and edit for a project using a project name or project number.

      If the searched project is matched with one in the database the user is then shown a menu that allows them to modify the project in different ways.

      Parameters:
      readProj - readProj object under 'ProjectDetails'.
      user - scanner object to get user input.
      See Also:
      • ProjectDetails
      • ProjectDetails.getProjList()
      • Project.getProjName()
      • Project.getProjNum()
      • Menu
      • Menu.editProj(Scanner)

    • updateProj

      public static void updateProj(ProjectDetails readProj, Scanner user)
      User chooses and edits a project from a list of all projects in the system.

      User is displayed all projects in the system. User can choose from the list or enter -1 to exit to main menu.
      When a correct project is chosen user is then shown a menu to edit that project.

      Parameters:
      readProj - readProj object under 'ProjectDetails'.
      user - scanner object to get user input.
      See Also:
      • Menu
      • Menu.editProj(Scanner)
      • ProjectDetails
      • ProjectDetails.getProjList()
      • Project.getProjName()
      • Project.getProjNum()

    • addProj

      public static void addProj(ProjectDetails readProj, Scanner input, Contacts cust, Contacts cont, Contacts arch)
      A 'Project' object is created from user inputed data.

      User is prompted to enter details of each individual (customer,contractor and architect) involved in the project.
      User is then required to enter all the details for the project.

      Parameters:
      readProj - readProj object under 'ProjectDetails'.
      input - scanner object to get user input.
      cust - 'Contacts' object of all customers.
      cont - 'Contacts' object of all contractors.
      arch - 'Contacts' object of all architect.
      See Also:
      • Person
      • Person.getName()
      • Contacts
      • Contacts.addToContactList(Person)

    • setProjName

      public static String setProjName(String projName, String name, String buildType)
      If project name is not given by user this sets it to the building type and the surname of customer combined.
      Parameters:
      projName - string containing name of the project.
      name - name of the customer.
      buildType - building type.
      Returns:
      combination of building type and surname or the original project name.
      See Also:
      • Checks
      • Checks.formatString(String)
